snippet: A federal appeals court said Congress would have until December to decide whether to allow the Nuclear Regulatory Commission to approve Yucca Mountain as a waste disposal site.
abstract: Federal appeals court says it will issue an order for the Nuclear Regulatory Commission to resume an evaluation of a possible nuclear waste repository at Yucca Mountain, a volcanic ridge in the Nevada desert, unless Congress acts by December to resolve the legal tangle around the project.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court said Congress would have until December to decide whether to allow the Nuclear Regulatory Commission to approve Yucca Mountain as a waste disposal site.

headline.seo: Court Weighs an Order on Yucca Mountain
headline.main: Court Weighs an Order on Nuclear Waste Site in Nevada
headline.print_headline: Court Weighs an Order On Nuclear Waste Site
